name: Thank You, Have a Nice Day
name_original: Thank You, Have a Nice Day
description:
Trade melodies with your customers and console them when their moods are down.

You are a quaint shopkeeper of a melody trading store.  Customers from your quiet town come in and sing their melodies based on their mood.  You must listen to their songs and console them by trading one your melodies with them.  Learn about each unique customer every time you play and find out what makes them calm and content.  The answer may not be as obvious as it seems.
